rows.label: tev023201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Rosie about her work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Rosie if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0001
rows.name:
My team is researching issues related to New LA's
sustainability—particularly concerning water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Using this purification plant to process wastewater and
rainwater for reuse would be solution enough,
don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Nevertheless, Ajoa's gotten it into her head that there's
some big shortage looming, and the only solution is to
use water from outside the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0004
rows.name:
You know the only reason for that is because
Ian is handsome and she wants to work together
with him at the lake. Ugh! So unprofessional![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Some nutty lady has been pestering people at the
cathedral recently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0009
rows.name:
She's going around claiming that some god called the
"Bringer of Miracles" led New LA to crash on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Begging the obvious question: Where was Mr. Miracles
when the xenoforms attacked us in the first goddamn
place?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ugh. I try to pray at church every day, but now I
totally dread it because I know this batcrap-crazy lady
is going to hassle me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Rosie about her work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Rosie about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0012
rows.name:
As the population expands and production increases,
the water shortages my team anticipated have totally
materialized.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0013
rows.name:
But there's no need to worry—the Biahno water-
purification plant that we built has stabilized our
water supply.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0014
rows.name:
It wasn't a plan that I supported at first, but I've come
around now that I see how much good it's doing for
the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Ajoa and Ian have transferred to the Biahno water-
purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0020
rows.name:
...What, me? Oh, hell no. I wouldn't be caught dead
over there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0021
rows.name:
The whole area is still crawling with indigens, right?
What fool would want to be stationed there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0022
rows.name:
That's why I had no complaints when Ian assigned me
to manage the New LA office instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0023
rows.name:
...Even though I suspect he did it so that those two
lovebirds wouldn't have me interrupting them at their
little lakeside retreat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_SEL2011
rows.name:
Ask Rosie about the effects of
xenoforms moving to NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Rosie about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0024
rows.name:
The growing xenoform population has had a major
impact on New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0025
rows.name:
We don't want them on the public dole, so that
means giving them jobs in order for them to become
self-reliant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0026
rows.name:
It also forces us to increase our production of food and
potable water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0027
rows.name:
Oh, and they need places to live as well.
And yeah, we have that big Ma-non ship,
but we can't have them living like refugees forever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0028
rows.name:
So I don't have time to sit around licking my wounds.
I have to get out there and do what I can for them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0031
rows.name:
With my friends gone, there's no one left to manage
the Biahno water-purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0032
rows.name:
After that...incident, I was hoping we could run some
kind of automated maintenance routine at the plant so
no one had to go there anymore...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0033
rows.name:
But that's a pipe dream, because a lot of the plant's
maintenance can only be performed by human hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0034
rows.name:
That means I'm going to have to be the one to head
out there—and that scares the heck out of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Rosie about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0035
rows.name:
The Orphe have created autosentries for the
Biahno water-purification plant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0036
rows.name:
...Oh, you helped them with that? Wow!
You really ARE the [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ] of New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0037
rows.name:
Well, thanks to you, it sounds like we no longer need
to worry about indigen attacks there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0038
rows.name:
Then I've got no excuse. For the good of New LA—
and to make sure my colleagues' sacrifice was not in
vain—I'm going to go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_SEL4011
rows.name: Ask Rosie about her colleagues.

rows.label: tev023201_SEL4021
rows.name: Ask Rosie about recent developments.

rows.label: tev023201_SEL4031
rows.name: Ask Rosie about her colleagues.

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0039
rows.name:
I just heard from Ajoa! She says she's finally up
and moving around again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0040
rows.name: She even told me a little about what happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0041
rows.name:
Apparently a cantor laid eggs inside of her in order
to take advantage of the organic components of her
mimeosome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0042
rows.name:
...Oh my god, I can't even imagine it.
They really are aliens, aren't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0043
rows.name:
Well, I'd better get to work. I don't want Ajoa to be
disappointed in me when she makes it back over here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0046
rows.name:
Having Tan'celeg around has been a huge help.
Now when I have technical issues, I can bring them
straight to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0047
rows.name:
The only problem is that whenever I'm just grumbling
about something, he takes it seriously and proposes
some rational solution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0048
rows.name:
He's so serious! It's like talking to a man who just
doesn't listen, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0049
rows.name:
But, uh...keep that between you and me, okay?
As a work partner, he's fantastic. I'd hate to lose him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0058
rows.name:
I heard back from the team of analysts who were
investigating what...used to be Ajoa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0059
rows.name:
Apparently a cantor laid eggs inside of her in order
to take advantage of the organic components of her
mimeosome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0060
rows.name:
...Oh my god, I can't even imagine it.
They really are aliens, aren't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0061
rows.name: It must have been so horrible...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023201_MSG0062
rows.name:
Anyway, from this day forth, I've decided to take good
care of this place...just like Ajoa and Ian would have.[ST:wait ]
